botConfig.name: system.intentConfidenceThreshold
botConfig.description: The minimum confidence score required to match a skill's intent with user input. If there is no match, the transition action is set to 'unresolvedIntent'.(Minimum value 0, maximum value 1)

botConfig.name: system.errorUnexpectedErrorPrompt
botConfig.description: The message when there is an unexpected error
botConfig.value: Oops! I am facing a technical error at the moment. Please try again later.
